name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven SZAREWICZ, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven SZAREWICZ, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
CAPPY, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Charles A. Knoll, Jr., Richard O’Neill Early, Pittsburgh, Donald R. Kuchek, Springdale, for Steven Szarewicz.
Robert E. Colville, Claire C. Capristo, Kevin McCarthy, Pittsburgh, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
701 A.2d 222
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Steven SZAREWICZ, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 18, 1997.
Decided Oct. 7, 1997.
Charles A. Knoll, Jr., Richard O’Neill Early, Pittsburgh, Donald R. Kuchek, Springdale, for Steven Szarewicz.
Robert E. Colville, Claire C. Capristo, Kevin McCarthy, Pittsburgh, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
